For my second 2014 set review I'
column2: he decided to Review Bat Strike, which has 97 pieces and a brand new Minifigure&nbsp

column1: The box is a new design for 2014, it is much easier to open than the previous packaging.
The Instructions for Building the model is 23 pages long, with another few pages showing how to play the game.
The parts in this set are very good, you get four of the new wing pieces,a New Bat head piece,11 CHI crystals , A purple Speedor and A purple ripcord.

column1: You set up your Bat obstacle and put the ramp on the front of it, then set up the CHI pins, then pull your Speedorz rip cord and sit it at the front of the ramp, your Speedor
column2: goes up the ramp, over the Bat obstacle and knock over the CHI pins.

One who picks the first score on there card, for each time you beat your opponents score you get Two CHI Crystals, the first Person to get six CHI Crystals is the Winner.
A great set , definitely worth the money for the New Parts and Minifigure.
